I am back! With another question. I own a sword that has a mei of Soshu 
Ju=
 Hiromasa. It is papered by NBTHK as Hozon attributing this mei as 
correct=
. I have researched the Zuikan, Jiten and Fujishiro and believe 
it is a co=
rrect signature and probably the fifth Hiromasa.

The question is, who made=
 the Tsuba? Is it Kyo-sukashi or Akasaka? Or 
is it something else? Please =
see my photo album for the pictures I have 
of it. All the pic's show it mo=
unted. 

Thank you as always,

Elliott
